name: imagecreatefromgd2
purpose: Create a new image from GD2 file or URL

return.description: Returns an image resource identifier on success, FALSE on errors.

notes.description: This function requires GD 2.0.1 or later (2.0.28 or later is recommended).

Windows versions of PHP
prior to PHP 4.3.0 do not support access of remote files via this function,
even if allow_url_fopen is enabled.
